ComicInfo.Penciller: David Gatzmer,Ian Carney,Mœbius,Phil Elliott,Rick Geary,Shawn McManus,Tom Mcweeney,Nicole Hollander,Moebius,Andreas Martens,Nicole Hollander,Moebius,Phil Elliott,Ian Carney,Andreas Martens,Rick Geary,Tom McWeeney
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jean-Michel Charlier and Moebius steer events absurdly awry in "Blueberry: Arizona Love." Andreas' "Rork: Capricorn" continues, as incidents conspire to reveal Rork's true nature. Randy the Skeleton returns for a gender-bending foray into glamour with "Miss Salford," courtesy of that wacky duo, Aidan Potts and Ian Carney; Nicole Hollander's "Sylvia" regards her cats' latest offense with astonishment; Rick Geary takes us on "Hazard Patrol"; and Phil Elliott and Lloyd Thatcher grant us another glimpse of life in the "Post-Apocalypse." Best of all, watch for a "mind-expanding" edition of "Caricatures," by Tom McWeeney. Painted cover by Shawn McManus. *Story Titles * Sylvia Blueberry: Arizona Love Chapter 3 Post-Apocalypse! Rady The Skeleton: Miss Salford Rork: Capricorn Chapter 2 Hazard Patrol Caricatures $1.00
